issue.title: [R] stringr functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15158](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15158). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
**Umbrella ticket for the Initiative aimed at reaching support for the most important stringr functions in the R bindings**
